## p. 16 (#25) ##############################################

wed
Social Register
Summer
1919.
Vol. XXXIII, No. 75.
JUNE, 1919.
Contains the Summer Addresses of residents of
New York Pittsburgh Seattle
Washington Cleveland
Portland
Philadelphia Cincinnati Southern California
Chicago Dayton
(Los Angeles & Pasadena)
Boston
St. Paul
Baltimore
Providence Minneapolis Buffalo
St. Louis
San Francisco Detroit
New Orleans
Southern Cities
Each city distinct by itself, arranged in the above order.
f
SOCIAL . REGISTER . ASSOCIATION,
BOWLING GREEN, 29 BROADWAY, NEW YORK CITY.
Copyright 1919 by THE SOCIAL REGISTER ASSOCIATION.


## p. 16 (#26) ##############################################

Social Registers of each city are issued in November and
their accuracy is maintained throughout the year by means
of Dumtoix, in December, January, February and April; and by
the Summer Social Register in July, with country and foreign
addresses of all the cities combined.
They record the full names and addresses of members of
prominent families grouped together, the clubs to which they
belong, and the marriage and death of each person as it
may occur.
NapjesotTimidre 14 to 20 ) older members of their families.
* 12 to 171 appear under the names of
The Locater cataloguing in one alphabetical order every name
in all the Social Registers with the family's head under which it
may be found and the city in which the name appears, is
essential, owing to the many inter-marriages among families
in the various cities and constant changes from one city
to another. Reference to the Locater shows at once under
what city to look for any desired name and there all required
information may be gleaned.
The names of Maided who have married into families of other
cities appear among the Maladies of their former city with
their present married name and the city of their residence in
italics.
The subscription is $5.00 per annum for each city.
A subscription of $35.00 will include all the issues for
New York, Washington, Philadelphia, Chicago, Boston, Provi-
dence, St. Louis, Pittsburgh, Cleveland & Cincinnati & Dayton,
St. Paul & Minneapolis, San Francisco & Oakland, Seattle
& Portland, Southern California, Baltimore, Buffalo, Detroit
New Orleans, and Southern Cities from Richmond to Atlanta,
and the Locater.
For $7.50 the Locater is included with the year's sub-
scription for any one city.
To insure the finding of a name in the Social Register look for
it first in the Locater.


## p. 16 (#27) ##############################################

Families not appearing in this Summer issue will be found at
the address given in previous issues.
Duatiolles under front cover of this book should he con-
sulted first for all changes. If the naine be not found there
it is correct in the main book.
It has been customary to insert in the Summer Social
Register, the names of Yachts, the Clubs under which they
are chartered, and a cut to indicate their classification.
This was discontinued last year owing to war conditions,
and this year the custom has been only partially restored,
some of the Yacht Clubs being too uncertain as to their
members' plans to justify the issuing of an authentic schedule.

efense
esignations

A star * affixed opposite the name indicates honorable dis-
charge from the service.
